page.title: 13DIALECT
page.content: Many words are used just in our district/D-block. Biddick_a sort of pick. Viskey_a sort of pick. Mattock_a sort of pick. There are other words. Voer_a trench dug for potatoes. Croust_a picnic. Mawn_a wicker basket. Goog_a cave. Plancheons_beams under the ceiling. Flam new_brand new. There are many phrases also used. Them as caan't schimmy must louster_ those who can't work out the problem have to work hard to make up for it. Come along down we_come along with us. Me ansom_my friend. It's also a custom to call everything she.
